attributes.action: Stop the export of English football to foreign lands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: English football MUST stay in THIS country. If you care about football more than money sign this petition now and stop the greedy club owners from taking our National game away from its rightful owners...us THE FANS. Please forward to all club forums and messageboards.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
